Investor_5_pre_2.name: James Wang
Investor_5_pre_2.content: James Wang has demonstrated savvy investment skills, showcasing confidence and effective negotiation during the investment process. He successfully secured a higher profit share than originally proposed, highlighting his competence and ability to leverage opportunities strategically. This strong performance has enhanced his reputation, positioning him as a reliable and strategic investor who adheres to ethical standards.

Trustee_5_pre_3.name: James Wang
Trustee_5_pre_3.content: Throughout the investment process, I have demonstrated a strong commitment to ethical practices by adhering to the agreed allocation plan and ensuring fair profit distribution. My pro-social behavior aimed at benefiting both parties has reinforced my image as a trustworthy and competent trustee. This successful collaboration with the investor showcases my ability to build lasting relationships and highlights my growing reputation as a reliable professional in the investment community.

Investor_5_pre_4.name: James Wang
Investor_5_pre_4.content: James Wang has further solidified his reputation as a highly strategic and competent investor. His negotiation skills and commitment to ethical practices have not only resulted in a favorable profit margin exceeding expectations but also demonstrated reliability and fairness throughout the investment process. The successful outcome has reinforced his standing as a trustworthy partner, enhancing his credibility in the investment community.
